item.description:
The Ira’s Singles Event

The Ira of the Ira’s Singles events co-hosts this exciting and fun Event.
You may want to Find a Keeper or you may just want to meet new friends – it’s all good. As the Ira says, “Come Alone, but Never Feel Alone.” Get out and party with other singles this summer.


SINGLES DANCE AND SO MUCH MORE

KICKING OF FALL WITH OKTOBERFEST

Saturday, September 11, 6 p.m.

Eat, drink, mingle and dance the night away

Plenty of Slow Dances……Yay……

Everyone’s back from summer vacation and they’re ready to have fun and meet new people!! And we’re ready to shake things up and make this the best singles event and dance party in Western Mass!!! ( Yes,Wes You can help make it happen!!!!

Ladies, invite your male friends and let’s get more men to party with us and meet all the fabulous women we know who have been coming to Find a Keeper every month!!

Yes, we know the summer months were light in attendance, but let’s all get back in the groove, eat, mingle, dance and have fun, fun, fun

FOR SINGLES!!

FREE ? OR CLOSE TO FREE

FREE
The Delaney House has offered Free Admission to any past participant in the Find A Keeper Series. For this to happen, you must pre register with a phone call for the event.

ALMOST FREE

Register and pay in advance for only $20!! All that delicious food for only $20, plus DJ and Dancing!!! $30 at the door, so save money by reserving your space in advance.

The Delaney House, One Country Club Rd., Holyoke, MA- 413-532-1800

Find a Keeper, the newest, most personal way for singles 40 and over to meet

6:00P.M. – 8:00P.M. Cocktails/Food/Chit Chat
8:00 P.M. Let the music move you and put you in a party mood. A “cool DJ” will be doing the spinning and happy to play your requested sounds.


Food Below is for the Energy to Dance!!!!

Fantastic Food Stations!!

It is at the Delaney House which means the Food will be awesome, and plenty of it.






Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: September 11. Saturday. The Singles Dance

Questions: 860-604-5792. Please see Pictures of events at the Delaney House and other Ira’s events, see: www.the irassinglesevents.com

The FoodStuff:::::::

Oktoberfest Menu

Vegetables with cheese fondue for dipping
Spinach salad with honey mustard dressing
house garden salad with Roquefort dressing
garlic bread

Food Stations
Grilled Bratwurst and Knockwurst, sauerkraut
rye breads
mustards
German potato salad

Schnitzel with wild mushroom sauce
Pierogies with sauteed onions and sour cream (cross-cultural, lol!)
Sauteed red cabbage

Dessert
Dark chocolate mousse with raspberry sauce
Strudel with whipped cream
Carrot cake with caramel sauce
item.how_to_find_us: A bunch of Singles Having Fun!!
item.name: The Ira- Singles Dance, DJ, Great Food, Mingling, Oktoberfest, What a Night!!
